title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk and observe the classroom
thoughts: This is the first day of the sociology experiment. I should follow all the rules carefully and make a good impression. The classroom looks very structured with the flags and uniform requirements. I wonder what the daily pledge will be like and how the discipline scoring works.
memory: Noticed strict classroom structure with flags and uniforms
Preparing to follow all rules carefully

action: Maintain proper posture and focus attention forward while subtly noting the whispering
thoughts: I should keep focusing on the teacher and not get distracted by the whispering. Following the rules is important, and I don't want to lose any discipline points on the first day.

action: Maintain perfect posture and watch teacher's reaction to the question
thoughts: The teacher just caught someone whispering and now another student is asking about competition rules. I need to stay perfectly still and follow all rules to avoid getting in trouble. The teacher seems very strict about discipline today.
memory: Student asking about competition rules while teacher is already tense
Maintaining rule-following behavior to avoid attention

action: Maintain perfect posture while processing the competition rules
thoughts: The group competition sounds intense but I need to follow all the rules carefully. Winning privileges would be nice but avoiding discipline problems is more important. I should make sure I understand exactly how the scoring works.
memory: Need to understand scoring system thoroughly
Maintaining strict rule compliance is priority
